name: Hard Boiled Chicken
description:
It's a solo player shoot all you can game, where you kill as many enemies as you can to beat the highscore ( Hard Boiled Points ) , Do you have what it takes to be the hard boiled chicken? Play the game and have fun shooting! :D 

CONTROLS 

  • KEYBOARD A - MOVE LEFT
  • KEYBOARD D - MOVE RIGHT
  • KEYBOARD SPACE - NORMAL ATTACK
  • KEYBOARD LEFT SHIFT - SPECIAL ATTACK

NOTE :  This is just a demo game I made out of a 48 hours game jam and I'm still planning if I'll continue developing this game, so if there's a bug or some shit, just leave a comment, thank you :)
